'''''Treasure Hunter of the Shimmering Woods''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Sumeru: The Rainforest of Lore]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to open a total of 200 treasure [[chests]] in Avidya Forest, Lokapala Jungle, Ardravi Valley, Ashavan Realm, Vissudha Field, Lost Nursery, and Vanarana.
